name: Super Mario on Scratch 3 Reboot - HTML Port
name_original: Super Mario on Scratch 3 Reboot - HTML Port
description:
This is Super Mario on Scratch 3 Reboot that is now ported to itch.io!

It may take a little while to load.

Here is the game running on Scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/527969970/

Credits:

MusicManJoe on Scratch for playtesting

xXNunyaXx on Scratch for playtesting

Grayforz24682 on Scratch for support

NightCat28 on Scratch for feedback

Brad-Games on Scratch for a bit of the tick code and feedback

FunnyAnimatorJimTV on Scratch for helping enemy listing code

BILLGATESFAN on Scratch for helping the clone spawning code and feedback
